Content.title: Darren Ferguson
Content.name: Darren Ferguson
Content.bodyText:
@ruben - thanks for the feedback. I like the idea of #2 being a browser plugin then it could be used for any text in a web page. I will have a look at TinyMCE integration and see how hard it would be though.

RE: #1, I'm not really a fan doing search and replace in XSLT but you make a very good point about the links updating in line with the configuration, I guess an XSLT extension would be the way to go here.
